page.title: 13NEW HOUSES IN WALKINGTON.
page.content: IN 1985 THERE ARE 3 NEW CURRENT HOUSING DEVELOPMENTS,ALL HALLOWS,AN EXTENSION TO THE PRESENT ALL HALLOWS ESTATE;RED GATES;AND A SITE OPPOSITE TOWNSEND"PIT" ON THE MAIN ROAD AT THE WESTERN END OF THE VILLAGE. THE ALL HALLOWS AND RED GATES SITES ARE INTRODUCING A NEW FEATURE TO THE VILLAGE,ONE BEDROOM FLATS ALONGSIDE DETACHED AND SEMI_DETACHED HOUSES. A TOTAL OF 21 FLATS AND 32 HOUSES WILL BE BUILT ON THE ALL HALLOWS SITE AND 2 FLATS,20 HOUSES AND 1 BUNGALOW AT RED GATES.EVENTUALLY,THERE ARE EXPECTED TO BE 85 DWELLINGS AT RED GATES INCLUDING 2 BEDROOMED HOUSING. WHEN COMPLETED THE THIRD,WESTERN, SITE WILL INCLUDE 7,3_BEDROOMED DETACHED BUNGALOWS AND 11,3&4 BEDROOM DETACHED HOUSES. RURAL WALKINGTON IS RAPIDLY FADING BY ADDING 156 HOUSES TO THE 326 EXISTING.
